Name: Ship Graveyard Simulator
About the game: / / Visit the largest ship graveyard in the world. A dozen kilometers of beach filled with wrecks. Lots of valuable materials in ships wrecked on the coast. Thousands of tons of steel. Choose the most valuable ship for you and start the adventure. Play as one of the workers during the most dangerous work in the world. Cut, hit, weld! Dismantle one of the available parts of the ship, and sell the obtained parts and upgrade your equipment. Explore all decks of the ship for valuable items. Take advantage of the opportunity to explore the mysterious spaces hidden inside these amazing colossi. The job of a worker dismantling ships is one of the most dangerous in the world. Demolition with only basic tools. If you are not afraid to get your hands dirty with oils and other substances, take the hammer in your hands and go to work, you have many ships to destroy. You can sell or exchange the acquired items for other items. Be careful, you can have a serious accident or even die at any time
